database.name: VIEW ETBIIE_IE_CONFIGURATIONS_V
database.view: SELECT con.searchkey, con.type, COALESCE(conline.doctype, conline.m_product_category_id, conline.m_product_id, conline.c_glitem_id) AS record_id, conline.number, conline.string, conline.yesno FROM etbiie_ie_configuration con JOIN etbiie_ie_config_line conline ON con.etbiie_ie_configuration_id = conline.etbiie_ie_configuration_id
